job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Full time, remote opportunity for a <strong>Software Engineer</strong>. This role will be responsible for developing multi-tiered product solutions and web services for SaaS applications. You will be an integral part of a growing team at a very successful software firm. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>This is a permanent role with an excellent compensation and benefits package.&nbsp;100% remote opportunity. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>4+ years of full stack software development experience with:</li><li>Web frameworks- (such as Django, Ruby on Rails, Flask, Express, Spring MVC, etc.)</li><li>Database experience</li><li>Experience with one of the following- Python, Javascript, Ruby, Java, Go, etc.</li><li>Knowledge of CI/CD</li><li>Preferred- REST, Test driven development, Javascript, GIT</li><li>Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>If you are interested in this Software Developer opportunity, please apply to this post or email your resume directly to Dan Gilliam, email: dan.gilliam@cannonsearch.com.</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Keys: Software Developer, Software Engineer, Full stack Developer, SaaS, Amazon, Azure, Cloud, software development, web services</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p></p>
